channel.title: Communities or meetups in Reading, UK?
channel.description:
Hi all. I've been inspired by posts about meetups in Swindon, Brighton and East Midlands. I've also seen the awesome looking Redhill Micropreneurs group.
Does anyone know of any communities or meetups in Reading, UK?

item.title: Communities or meetups in Reading, UK?
item.dc:creator: paulsilver
item.description:
I’ve heard of Startup Grind - https://www.meetup.com/Startup-Grind-Thames-Valley/ - but I’m not sure how good it is. There are some others listed on Meetup - https://www.meetup.com/topics/technology-startups/gb/03/reading/ - hopefully if you can find one decent one, it’ll lead to some other things.

Read full topic
item.source: Communities or meetups in Reading, UK?
